name: Node Traversal
description:
Age: 8+
Play time: 2-8 minutes.

Instructions:
Use the mouse to interact.
R to reset a level.
M to mute the music.
ESC to go back to the main menu.

Github: https://github.com/Maaack/Node-Traversal

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KgaBPYzTut0

gotm.io: https://gotm.io/50shadesofmarek/node-traversal
